titleStmt.title: The Cronycles of Englonde with the dedes of popes and emperours, and also the descripcyon of Englonde
Saint Albans chronicle.
titleStmt.author: Higden, Ranulf, d. 1364. Polycronicon.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete at the sygne of the Sonne by Wynkyn de Worde,
publicationStmt.date: the yere of our lorde god. M.CCCCC. [et] xxviij. the .ix. daye of Apryll] [1528]

notesStmt.note: Known as "the Saint Albans chronicle"; not the same compilation as the "Chronicles of England" first printed by Caxton (STC 9991-4).
Includes "The descripcyon of Englonde", an excerpt from Higden, Ranulf. Polycronicon.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
